title: Dog friendly, Loft In-Law Studio, near new Whole Foods
posting_body: Private in-law studio with large, carpeted loft area for sleeping or extra space.
(Dogs can't get up to the loft, sorry)
Hardwood floors, skylights, private entrance and patio area.
Bathroom with shower.
Full kitchen.
Lightly traveled one way street.
Ample off-street parking.
Setback from E. Blithedale, which is busy.
Trouble-free commute - 1 minute to freeway, with no freeway noise.
Walking distance to shopping, the E. Blithedale Whole Foods, the post office and bus stops.
Dog friendly.
Fenced yard.
Walking distance to dog park too.
Outside storage shed large enough for bicycle and more.
Requirements:
One person only, absolutely no smokers, or cats - no exceptions, please don't ask.
Lease through 6/30/2023, renewable for 12 month increments.
First month and $3100 security deposit (plus additional $600 pet deposit for a dog) due at time of lease signing.
Utilities included: heat, water, garbage, and electricity.
No Electric Vehicle charging permitted.
Available September 1st.
or possibly sooner.
E. Blithedale siding between Meadow Ln. and Dorset Ln.
Please email or text, or leave a voice-mail message.
I don't take calls from unknown numbers...
